home.hero.title: Ship localized marketing sites in days, not quarters.
home.hero.description: WebLingo copies your marketing site, translates content with AI plus human review, and keeps every locale in sync automatically. Launch globally without touching your CMS.
home.features.ai.title: AI translations with human guardrails
home.features.ai.description: Blend large language models with curated glossaries and review flows so every locale sounds on-brand.
home.features.sync.title: Automatic sync from your source site
home.features.sync.description: WebLingo watches your primary domain, detects content changes, and republishes localized pages automatically.
home.features.seo.title: Native SEO & performance
home.features.seo.description: Generate localized metadata, hreflang tags, and optimized pages that deploy to the edge on every publish.
home.features.supporting: {feature} plug into your existing stack, with analytics, review flows, and localization QA built in.
home.pricingTeaser.title: Plans tuned for localization teams
home.pricingTeaser.subtitle: Start with a single market or launch a global program. Every plan includes CNAME publishing, glossaries, and automated sync.
home.cta.title: Launch in every market with confidence
home.cta.description: See how WebLingo keeps your multilingual marketing stack in sync, ties into your analytics, and supports custom review workflows.
pricing.header.title: Plans for every stage of growth
pricing.header.description: Start small, then scale your localization program without replatforming. Every plan includes automatic content sync, analytics export, and localized SEO out of the box.

pricing.tiers.launch.name: Launch
pricing.tiers.launch.description: Everything you need to localize a single marketing site.
pricing.tiers.growth.name: Growth
pricing.tiers.growth.description: Scale to multiple regions with shared glossaries and review flows.
pricing.tiers.enterprise.name: Enterprise
pricing.tiers.enterprise.description: Tailored support, SSO, and dedicated infrastructure for regulated teams.
contact.header.title: Let’s tailor WebLingo to your marketing stack
contact.header.description: Tell us about your primary site and the markets you want to serve. We’ll schedule a session to walk through integrations, workflows, and rollout plan.
contact.direct.heading: Prefer email?
contact.direct.description: Reach us at hello@weblingo.dev and we’ll respond within one business day.
try.header.title: Preview WebLingo on your own site
try.header.description: Submit a public URL and we’ll spin up a private preview in your target languages. Publishing requires a paid plan.
docs.title: Getting started
docs.overview: Launch localized sites in four steps.
docs.step.one: Subscribe to a plan on the pricing page.
docs.step.two: Connect your source domain and pick target locales.
docs.step.three: Create CNAME records pointing to WebLingo.
docs.step.four: Review localized content, then publish with one click.
docs.cname.heading: CNAME setup
docs.cname.description: We’ll provide hostnames, TTL guidance, and registrar-specific walkthroughs as part of onboarding.

legal.notice.description: Detailed company and compliance details will be published here before launch.
checkout.header.title: Confirm your WebLingo plan
checkout.header.description: Stripe will securely collect payment details. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel at any time inside the billing portal.
checkout.form.email.help: Stripe will send receipts and billing info here.
checkout.form.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
checkout.success.title: Welcome to WebLingo!

checkout.cancel.title: No worries—nothing was charged.

legal.terms.title: Terms of Service
legal.terms.sections.overview.title: 1. Agreement overview
legal.terms.sections.overview.body: These Terms of Service govern your access to WebLingo and any related services. By creating an account or using the product, you agree to this agreement on behalf of your organization.
legal.terms.sections.use.title: 2. Acceptable use
legal.terms.sections.use.body: You may not misuse the localization infrastructure, attempt to circumvent rate limits, probe the service for vulnerabilities, or resell WebLingo without written consent. We reserve the right to suspend accounts that violate this policy.
legal.terms.sections.billing.title: 3. Subscription billing
legal.terms.sections.billing.body: Plans renew automatically at the selected cadence until cancelled. You can cancel at any time and your localization sites remain available until the end of the current billing period.
legal.terms.sections.data.title: 4. Data handling
legal.terms.sections.data.body: We process localized content solely to deliver the service. Data is encrypted in transit and at rest. Please contact support if you require a data processing addendum or custom retention policy.
legal.terms.sections.liability.title: 5. Liability
legal.terms.sections.liability.body: Our total liability is limited to the fees paid during the previous twelve months. WebLingo is not responsible for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from use of the service.
legal.privacy.title: Privacy Policy
legal.privacy.sections.collect.title: Information we collect
legal.privacy.sections.collect.body: We collect account details, billing information, localized content, and product usage analytics necessary to operate and improve WebLingo.
legal.privacy.sections.use.title: How we use data
legal.privacy.sections.use.body: Data is used to deliver localization features, provide customer support, send service updates, and maintain the security and reliability of the platform.
legal.privacy.sections.retention.title: Retention
legal.privacy.sections.retention.body: Localized content and analytics are retained while your subscription is active and for 90 days after cancellation unless you request earlier deletion.
legal.privacy.sections.rights.title: Your rights
legal.privacy.sections.rights.body: You may export or delete your data at any time by contacting support. We respond to verified requests within thirty days.
legal.privacy.sections.processors.title: Third-party processors
legal.privacy.sections.processors.body: We rely on trusted infrastructure providers for hosting, storage, and payments (e.g., Stripe). Each processor adheres to strict security and privacy agreements.
